info.title: Hutch Agent API
info.description: A REST API for interacting with the Hutch Agent

post.summary: Submit a crate via POST Request Body for an already created job with the given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the of the job to submit a crate for.

202.description: The Submitted Request Crate was accepted and queued to be executed.

404.description: A Job with the provided ID could not be found.

409.description: This Job already has a Request Crate submitted.

post.summary: Provide a Cloud Storage Crate Source via POST Request Body for an already created job with the given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the of the job to provide a crate URL for.

requestBody.description:
An object detailing where to find a TRE-FX 5 Safes RO-Crate for the job,
            which Hutch can retrieve from a configured Cloud Storage Provider.

202.description: The Submitted Request Crate Source was accepted and queued to be fetched.

404.description: A Job with the provided ID could not be found.

409.description: This Job already has a Request Crate submitted.

post.summary: Provide a crate URL via POST Request Body for an already created job with the given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the of the job to provide a crate URL for.

requestBody.description: A URL to a TRE-FX 5 Safes RO-Crate for the job, which Hutch can retrieve with a GET Request.

202.description: The Submitted Request Crate URL was accepted and queued to be fetched.

404.description: A Job with the provided ID could not be found.

409.description: This Job already has a Request Crate submitted.

post.summary: Creates a Job entry and, if provided with a remote Crate, queues the job for Crate fetching.

200.description: The Job was registered, and is awaiting submission of a Request Crate.

202.description: The Job was registered, and the submitted Request Crate Source queued to be fetched.

400.description: The Job details submitted are invalid.

409.description: Hutch is already actively managing a Job with this Submission Id.

post.summary:
Accept an approval outcome for a job. If a job with the specified ID is fully approved, queue it for finalization.
Otherwise treat the job as failed.

requestBody.description: The outcome of the approval checks.

400.description: The request could not be parsed. Check the status field is a supported value.

404.description: The job corresponding to the given ID doesn't exist.

host.description: Cloud Storage Host e.g. a Min.io Server. Defaults to preconfigured value if omitted.

secure.description:
Connection to HutchAgent.Models.FileStorageDetails.Host should use SSL.
Defaults to true; should only really be false for development/testing.

bucket.description: Cloud Storage Container name e.g. a Min.io Bucket. Defaults to preconfigured value if omitted.

path.description:
Object ID for a single Cloud Storage item in the named HutchAgent.Models.FileStorageDetails.Bucket,
functionally the "Path" to the stored file -
or optionally a partial path denoting an item prefix (i.e. a directory path)

accessKey.description: Access Key for Cloud Storage. If omitted, will use OIDC if configured, or default to preconfigured value if not.

secretKey.description: Secret Key for Cloud Storage. If omitted, will use OIDC if configured, or default to preconfigured value if not.

port.description: Database Server Port. Defaults to PostgreSQL Default (5432)

database.description: Name of the Database to connect to

username.description: Username with access to the database

password.description: Password with access to the database

status.description: The current status of the Job

JobStatusModel.description: Public model for reporting a Job's Status in API responses.

subId.description:
This is a Submission ID as provided by the TRE Controller.
Hutch continues to use it to identify the job internally,
but also to interact with the TRE Controller API in future.

crateUrl.description:
Optional absolute URL where the Job's RO-Crate can be fetched from with a GET request.
Mutually exclusive with HutchAgent.Models.SubmitJobModel.CrateUrl
If all crate values are omitted at the time of Submission, a later submission can be made to provide a Remote URL, Cloud Storage details, or a binary crate payload.
